Hi Scott.

This seems like an easy defect ti fix, but I am unable to reproduce it.  I see
no errors in either of my eclipse logs when loading the manual test plugin.  Do
you still see this in your install?  If so, please let me know how you reproduce it.

If not, I'll close it as WORKSFORME.

Thanks,
--Joe
Confirmed with submitter that this defect no longer exists.

Now that we have a "3.3" Version in bugzilla, updating bugzillas targeted to 3.3
or a 3.3 iteration so that their Version matches their Target. "future",
"unspecified", "4.0", and "4.1" Versions will not be updated.
Re-assigning to Paul per his request.

P3 Of interest, but not planned or expected in this release 
minor A problem not affecting the actual function, but the behavior is not 
natural

Not sufficient resources to complete in TPTP v4.1 (i2).  As such, moving to 
TPTP 4.2.
In TPTP V4.2.0, the org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.TestManualPlugin class does not exist.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
